title: Counter-picking
body: Yo, wth is up with people not counter picking in gold and silver

replies.body: Because counter-picking and being a meta slave is not the most efficient way to climb. You need to be able to know your champions, their power spikes, their potential, and their strength.
They never did. And counterpicks don't matter at this level.

Bad players do not understand counterpicks, sort of self-explanatory.

Or like a recent "plat smurf" 0/9 vayne, they are just so good that it does not matter.
People just play the champs they like, the matchup just kind of...happens.
